body:
Hi, some of you might now as ThePluper or that weird guy :P

But I'm back after a year of playing UHC over at the ultrahardcore subreddit. This is an ask me anything, and I may not recognise some of you due to name changes and such but hopefully all goes well.
body_tagged:
Hi, some of you might now as ThePluper or that weird guy :P

But I'm back after a year of playing UHC over at the ultrahardcore subreddit. This is an ask me anything, and I may not recognise some of you due to name changes and such but hopefully all goes well.
title: Back in Business - AMA
